CANDIDATE'S PROFILE 
Position: .NET Software Engineer 
Personal Details  
Name:  PHAM VAN TINH (Phạm Văn Tình)  
Date of Birth: 20-10-1992  
Gender: Male  
Phone: -x-x- 64 79  
Email: xxx@gmail.com 
Address: 24/23/1 Tam Binh Street -  Thu Duc District - HCM City   
Marital status: Single  
Technical Skills  
Have more than 3 years of experience in web application development using .NET:  
✓ Experience with ASP.NET MVC, Entity Framework, NET Window Forms, Nhibernate.  
✓ Experience  with HTML/CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap.  
✓ Experience  using SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle.  
✓ Basic knowledge of Unit Test, OOP design principles  
✓ Experienced in building and maintaining servers, can use linux commands.  
✓ Having knowledge of linux.  
✓ Having knowledge of git (source control).  
✓ Research skill and team-work skill are good.  
✓ Can use English: reading, writing, simple communication.   
Education History  
● 2013 – 2013: Learning PHP certification at NHAT NGHE center.  
o Major in PHP 
o Graduated in 2013.   
● 2010 – 2014: College major in network administration at The University of Ho Chi Minh City.  
o Network Administration Specialization   
o Received by 11/2013  
Career Development
